Class KivaMoveTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • KivaMoveTest

  • public class KivaMoveTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Test class for the methods in the Kiva class. Tests are focused on verifying in move methods take Kiva to the correct location and orientation, as well as verifying if non-movement actions affect Kiva's class fields in the expected way. There is also exception throwing testing for both movement and non-movement actions the Kiva can perform.
    Since:
    10-03-2021
    Version:
    0.14
    Author:
    Franz Jacob Hernandez (herfrn@amazon.com)

    • Method Detail

      • showMapDimensions

        public void showMapDimensions()
        Method to help understand how the map's dimensions are setup. Displays a the dimensions to the user via the console.
        See Also:
        FloorMap.getMinRowNum(), FloorMap.getMinColNum(), FloorMap.getMaxRowNum(), FloorMap.getMaxColNum()

      • testDeltas

        public void testDeltas()
        Method to help understand what values getDelta() returns. Displays the values of each direction facing to the user via the console.
        See Also:
        FacingDirection.getDelta()

      • testDropOnDropZone

        public void testDropOnDropZone()
        Tests Kiva's ability to drop off a Pod. Main functionality that is being tested is Kiva's dropPod() method. Displays a message to the user based on whether or not the Kiva was able to drop up a Pod.
        See Also:
        Kiva.dropPod()

      • testDropPodOnEmpty

        public void testDropPodOnEmpty()
        Tests Kiva's exception handling for dropping Pods. Main functionality that is being tested is Kiva's dropPod() method. An IllegalDropZoneLocation exception should be thrown along with a diagnostic message.
        See Also:
        Kiva.dropPod(), IllegalDropZoneLocation

      • testDropWhenNoPod

        public void testDropWhenNoPod()
        Tests Kiva's exception handling for dropping a Pod when it is not carrying a Pod. Main functionality being tested is Kiva's dropPod() method. A NoPodException should be thrown along with a diagnostic message.

      • testForwardFromUp

        public void testForwardFromUp()
        Tests Kiva's forward movement from the UP orientation. Main field(s) to be verified are the location and direction it is facing. Displays a message to the user via the console, verification determines which message is displayed.
        See Also:
        Kiva.moveForward()

      • testForwardWhileFacingDown

        public void testForwardWhileFacingDown()
        Tests Kiva's forward movement from the LEFT orientation. Main field(s) to be verified are the location and direction it is facing. Displays a message to the user via the console, verification determines which message is displayed. moveLeft() is called twice.
        See Also:
        Kiva.moveForward(), Kiva.moveLeft()

      • testForwardWhileFacingLeft

        public void testForwardWhileFacingLeft()
        Tests Kiva's forward movement from the LEFT orientation. Main field(s) to be verified are the location and direction it is facing. Displays a message to the user via the console, verification determines which message is displayed. moveLeft() is called once.
        See Also:
        Kiva.moveForward(), Kiva.moveLeft()

      • testForwardWhileFacingRight

        public void testForwardWhileFacingRight()
        Tests Kiva's forward movement from the LEFT orientation. Main field(s) to be verified are the location and direction it is facing. Displays a message to the user via the console, verification determines which message is displayed. moveLeft() is called thrice.
        See Also:
        Kiva.moveForward(), Kiva.moveLeft()

      • testHitObstacle

        public void testHitObstacle()
        Tests Kiva's exception handling for moving into spaces occupied by an obstacle. Main functionality being tested is Kiva's validMove(int a, int b) method. IllegalMoveException should be thrown along with a diagnostic message.
        See Also:
        Kiva.validMove(int, int), IllegalMoveException

      • testHoldPodMoveToPod

        public void testHoldPodMoveToPod()
        Tests Kiva's exception handling for moving into spaces that contain a Pod while also holding a Pod. Main functionality be tested is Kiva's validMove(int a, int b) method. IllegalMoveException should be thrown along with a dianostic message.
        See Also:
        Kiva.validMove(int, int), IllegalMoveException

      • testOutOfBoundsMove

        public void testOutOfBoundsMove()
        Tests Kiva's exception handling for moving to coordinates outside the bounds of the map dimenions. Main functionality being tested is Kiva's validMove(int a, int b) method. There is an IllegalMoveException that should be thrown, but before the message's code segment is reached, an InvalidFloorMapLocationException is thrown instead.
        See Also:
        Kiva.validMove(int, int), InvalidFloorMapLocationException, IllegalMoveException

      • testTakeFromEmpty

        public void testTakeFromEmpty()
        Tests Kiva's exception handling for picking up a Pod from a location that does not have a Pod. Main functionality being tested is Kiva's takePod() method. A NoPodException should be thrown along with a diagnostic message.

      • testTakeOnPod

        public void testTakeOnPod()
        Tests Kiva's ability to pick up a Pod. Main functionality that is being tested is Kiva's takePod() method. Displays a message to the user based on whether or not the Kiva was able to pick up a Pod.
        See Also:
        Kiva.takePod()

        public void testTurnLeftFromDown()

        See Also:
        Kiva.moveLeft()

        public void testTurnLeftFromRight()

        public void testTurnLeftFromUp()

      • testTurnRightFromDown

        public void testTurnRightFromDown()
        Tests Kiva's ability to turn right. Main field(s) to be verified are the location and direction it is facing. Displays a message to the user via the console, verification determines which message is displayed. After moveLeft() is called twice, moveRight() is called once.
        See Also:
        Kiva.moveRight(), Kiva.moveLeft()

        See Also:
        Kiva.moveRight(), Kiva.moveLeft()
